ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'England wide'), OR( INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'London'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'South East'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'South West'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'East of England'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'East Midlands'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'West Midlands'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'Yorkshire and the Humber'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'North West'), INCLUDES(ov_project_region__c, 'North East') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is an error on this page. The 'England wide' region cannot be combined with other regions.
